## uintType variable

Returns the smallest possible \*unsigned\* int type enum for given `x`<!-- -->. E.g. if `x <= 256`<!-- -->, the function returns `Type.U8`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
uintType: (x: number) => UintType
```
